word: H7822 - שְׁחִין - shᵉchîyn - shekh-een' - Boil - கொதி

sections.paragraph: a boil, an inflamed spot, an inflammation, an eruption; used of man (leprosy), of man and beast
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root probably meaning to burn; inflammation, that is, an ulcer: - boil, botch.
